name: I Need You
content: Baby baby I swear to you
宝贝 宝贝 我向你发誓
Baby baby I'm here for you
宝贝 宝贝 我在这等你
Why I did those things to you
Why I broke your heart in two
Baby how I wish you could forgive me
宝贝 祈求你能原谅我
Now I see the price to pay
现在我了解我所需付出的代价
Baby how I wish you could forgive me
宝贝 祈求你能原谅我
When I know how it could have been
当我知道原来我们可能的结局
But I don't care what it leads to
And give love a chance to win
Baby baby I swear to you
宝贝 宝贝 我发誓
Any time you want me to yes I swear
无论何时只要你需要我 我发誓
Baby baby I here for you
宝贝 宝贝 我会在你身边
不要让我孤独一人 因为我需要你
I'll be there I will be there
我会在你身边 我会在你身边
I'll be ture I will be ture
我会真心相待 我会真心相待
是的 宝贝 我需要你
